definition: also written 機槍|机枪/machine gun
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
also written 重機槍|重机枪/heavy machine gun
also written 輕機槍|轻机枪/light machine gun

sentences.english: The machine gun hailed over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 機關槍的火力壓得我們擡不起頭來。

sentences.english: Much of it is what has been aptly described as " machine-gunning with scraps. " I think the technique fights coherence.
sentences.chinese: 其中許多已確切地被形容爲“用機關槍發射碎片”。

sentences.english: This toy machine gun dismantles easily.
sentences.chinese: 這種玩具機關槍很容易拆卸。

sentences.english: The zing of the passing bullet scared her.
sentences.chinese: 機關槍子彈的尖嘯聲嚇到了她。

sentences.english: A machine gun blasted just outside the tent.
sentences.chinese: 帳篷外，機關槍突然嘟嘟嘟地響起來。

sentences.english: We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現在持久戰中，食物是比機關槍更有效的武器。

sentences.english: He was shot by a terrorist with a machine-gun .
sentences.chinese: 他被恐怖分子用機關槍打死了。

sentences.english: He watched as the GIs set up a machine gun.
sentences.chinese: 他看到美國兵架起了一挺機關槍。

sentences.english: The soldiers were mown down by machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們被機關槍打死了。

sentences.english: Oh, did we forget to mention that Roger Rabbit gets machine gunned to death?
sentences.chinese: 對了，我們是否忘了提兔子羅傑被機關槍掃射死了。

sentences.english: Carl Vandenberge, two of Battle Company’s biggest. And they had stolen night vision goggles and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他們也偷來了敵人的夜視鏡和機關槍。

sentences.english: A machine gun was still blazing from a nearby roof.
sentences.chinese: 一架機關槍仍在附近的屋頂上連射。

sentences.english: When he reached the top, one of the target bunkers opened fire on him with machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 爬到崖頂後，一個目標地堡的機關槍向他開火。

sentences.english: The soldiers raked the trench with machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們用機關槍向戰壕內掃射。

sentences.english: Those young teenagers are carrying machine guns, and they feel trigger-happy.
sentences.chinese: 那些年輕人拿着機關槍，忘乎所以。

definition: to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
to soar/to rise high into the air
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
